map.select: SELECT CONCAT('category/',CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(id_cat,'/'),name),'.html')) as category_url FROM es_cat WHERE id_cat != 1
SELECT CONCAT('item/',CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(id_product,'/'),name),'.html')) as product_url FROM es_product LIMIT 50000
SELECT CONCAT('vendor/',username) as vendor_url FROM es_member LIMIT 50000
